meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a senator.
meanings.sent1: The senatorian speech was eloquent and persuasive.
meanings.sent2: Her senatorian behavior in the meeting impressed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The cat's senatorian pose on the couch made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree stood tall and senatorian in the middle of the park.
meanings.sent5: The senatorian aura of the courtroom filled the air with authority.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to the Senate.
meanings.sent1: The senatorian debate in the Senate lasted for hours.
meanings.sent2: The senatorian rules were strictly followed during the session.
meanings.sent3: The senatorian lunch menu at the Senate cafeteria was surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent4: The senatorian power struggle within the Senate was evident to all.
meanings.sent5: The senatorian atmosphere in the Senate chamber was charged with tension.

meanings.sent1: His senatorian attire made him look dignified and respectable.
meanings.sent2: The senatorian manners of the young politician were commendable.
meanings.sent3: The dog's senatorian behavior at the park impressed the other pet owners.
meanings.sent4: The majestic eagle soared through the sky with a senatorian grace.
meanings.sent5: The senatorian presence of the CEO commanded attention in the boardroom.
